name: Guided Generations
description: This extension brings the full power of the original 'Guided Generations' Quick Reply set to SillyTavern as a native extension. It provides modular, context-aware tools for shaping, refining, and guiding AI responsesâ€”ideal for roleplay, story, and character-driven chats. All features are accessible via intuitive buttons and menus integrated into the SillyTavern UI.

name: Moonlit Echoes Theme
description: Moonlit Echoes is a UI theme designed for SillyTavern. It has been customized and refined based on my personal preferences to create a more modern, elegant, and minimalist interface while enhancing the user experience across both desktop and mobile platforms.

name: Nemo Preset Extension
description: NemoPresetExt helps organize your SillyTavern prompts. It makes long lists of prompts easier to manage by grouping them into collapsible sections and adding a search bar.

name: Weather Pack
description: A SillyTavern extension that automatically fixes and normalizes markdown formatting in chat messages.

name: Nemo Lore
description: NemoLore is a comprehensive SillyTavern extension that enhances roleplay through intelligent memory management, narrative consistency, and automated lore expansion. It provides advanced noun detection, interactive highlighting, AI-powered summarization, core memory tracking, and semantic search capabilities.

name: Alternate Descriptions
description: A SillyTavern extension that allows you to save and manage multiple versions of character fields within a single character card. Perfect for experimenting with different character concepts without losing your original work.

name: Memory Books
description: A next-generation SillyTavern extension for automatic, structured, and reliable memory creation. Mark scenes in chat, generate JSON-based summaries with AI, and store them as 'vectorized' entries in your lorebooks. Supports group chats, advanced profile management, and bulletproof API/model handling.

name: Outfit Tracker
description: This extension lets you keep track of what you and your AI character is wearing (or not wearing).

name: WorldInfo Info
description: See which WorldInfo entries were active in the last generated message.

name: WorldInfo Recommender
description: A SillyTavern extension that helps you manage world info based on the current context with LLMs using connection profiles.
